botId.description: Idientifier of the bot to create the version for.

botVersion.description: Version number assigned to the version.

description.description: A description of the version. Use the description to help identify the version in lists.

localeSpecification.description:
Specifies the locales that Amazon Lex adds to this version. You can choose the draft version or any other previously published version for each locale. When you specify a source version, the locale data is copied from the source version to the new version.

The following arguments are optional:
